mapper.select: select ask_type, ask_subject, ask_content from ask order by ask_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from ask where ask_subject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select count(*) from ask where ask_type=#{type}
mapper.insert: insert into cs_board(cs_type, cs_subject, cs_content, cs_file, cs_date, cs_re_ref, cs_re_lev, cs_re_seq, order_od_idx, member_mb_id, pd_idx, od_num) values(#{cs_type}, #{cs_subject}, #{cs_content}, #{cs_file} ,SYSDATE(), #{cs_re_ref}, 0, 0, 1, #{member_mb_id}, #{pd_idx}, #{od_num})
insert into cs_file(board_idx, org_filename, str_filename, file_size, file_date, crea_id) values(#{board_idx}, #{org_filename}, #{str_filename}, #{file_size}, SYSDATE(), 'admin')
mapper.select: select idx, org_filename, round(file_size/1024, 1) as file_size from cs_file where board_idx=#{cs_idx} and del_gb = 'N'
select org_filename, str_filename from cs_file where idx=#{idx}
